author: David Wolfe
comment: It astounds me that such a large great network can't seem to get the coding right to play their ads. I completely understand the need for ads and am more than willing to watch them but when it takes me 2 hours to watch a 1 hour program because it keeps freezing when the ads start...unacceptable. Ads are how you get paid if you get anything right don't you think that should be it

author: Amanda Le
comment: ITS REALLY irritating when your watching a show and the app decides it wants to show an ad and then go to that ads site and not resume whatever it was you were watching! most the time i have to restart the app and then wherever i was in the episode i cant go to it, either i start from the beginning or its a pain to do but try n find your closest spot manually.

author: Alexis King
comment: So i haven't fully reviewed the app but just downloading this and trying to watch one show is ridiculous.  There are so many adds in between which wouldn't be as much of a big deal if they didn't keep freezing.  I can't even make it halfway through one episode without the adds freezing it up 100 times and having to restart it.

author: Tianah Belle
comment: Too many adds and they freeze, lag and play more than it says. I restart my app atleast 4 times every episode because it'll freeze half way through the ads or wont stop playing ads. I've gotten up to "12 out of 6" ads once before i closed the app. The worst part is i get to watch the ads all over again every single time i restart the app and fast foward to where i was because it mever saves it.

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: aubrey hallock
comment: Not only are there absurd amounts of ads, but half the time the ads glitch and you have to close out of the app and rewatch all the ads (minutes worth) only for the last ad to glitch again. I'd rather just stop watching ABC shows than go through that anymore.

author: Jessica Jimenez
comment: Still isn't meeting the bar.  I don't mind the ads, but the app freezes everytime the ads come on.  Ive sat through 30 ads to get past one section.  It's frustrating.   I'll watch the 6 ads required, as long as they work, don't freeze and you get back to the show after.  After all these years of issues, you think it would have been worked through by now.  Response- the app is fully updated and I'm still having issues

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist with this issue.

author: Cassandra Lopez
comment: I spent 90% of the time sitting through ads and a lot of lagging. I was desperate to watch a certain show, but it's ridiculous how awful this app is.  I'll be uninstalling as soon as I finish writing this review.  Don't waste your time unless you're very, very, VERY patient. Also the viewing was blurry, I wanna say...95% of the time.  It needs A LOT of work.

author: Julie Wilkerson
comment: Ok you gotta stop being ad basis. If I have already seen the ads and my app hangs, to resume watching where I left off means 15 minutes of commercials. Hate it.

author: Mr. Potter
comment: App worked great until it automatically logged me out of my Spectrum account; now trying to log into spectrum again gives a ForgeRock "maximum sessions limit or quota exhausted" page. When following the link placed on that page, it appears to redirect to a spectrum login page but the login won't work - states there is an error, ELI-9000. I don't know if this is Spectrum or ABC's error though at this point. If this isn't an ABC error, I'll gladly revisit this rating.

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content:
Hi there!

Our team would be happy to help you look into this issue! Please contact our support team either through the ABC app's feedback option under our help section or through our feedback form on our site here http://abc.go.com/feedback and select Site / Player Issues from the drop down menu.

author: Susan Grimes
comment: Boo-Hiss not being able to connect as we have internet but, not tv srrvice. I'm terminally ill & can't have tv service, yet I'm home 24/7 & appreciate good programing.

author: Lizzy Lou
comment: My first issue is that the ads pop up at strange intervals. Always mid-scene/mid-sentence. They should time them so they happen at the end of a scene, at least. My second issue is when it cuts for ads, half the time more ads will play than what was scheduled, (the bottom will read ad "7 out of 5" and once I even watched nine ads in a row. Please, can you fix this. It's very frustrating.

author: Aaron mikos
comment: There is a glitch with the adds I just spent 20 min trying to get past the same ad because every time they freeze you have to start over again, until its fixed you'll just be wasting your time

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: John Casey
comment: Absolute joke. Why even bother. If you're trying to watch live TV just go to Facebook and find someone sharing live. Don't buy anything from their sponsors unless they give you a quality product.

author: Denise Womack
comment: The upgrades have been wonderful. I really enjoy the new format. The shows now pause when there are incoming notifications instead of freeze or crash. Nice work Tech Dept!

author: hmrjkr07
comment: I thought I'd give it a try despite the bad reviews.   Honestly it's actually as bad as everyone says.   The commercials stop playing.   Not buffering,  just frozen.   I've tried closing and reopening,  etc.   It's just awful.   It shouldn't even get one star.

author: Elizabeth Boyce
comment: I love being able to watch "the good doctor" on this app because I can't watch it when it airs due to my work schedule! But I do get annoyed by the ads...

author: Becky Klawuhn
comment: Honestly I think this would be the perfect app if it didn't like to continually a lock me out until I reinjured all my provider information every few times I go into it. Other than that no complaints about it.

author: James Jones Jr
comment: It has everything I like to watch but 2 Flashpoint the police story and V about aliens trying to invade or take over the Earth.
Can't stream live TV, and I live in a big city, Miami.  I can stream just about every other channel. Start streaming in Miami and I'll watch you more.

author: Kenya Graves
comment: The ads freeze and I have to refresh the show to get through the frozen ads. It's better to use ABC's website to watch shows!

author: Jayne Newbauer
comment: I used to always really enjoy using the ABC app to watch my favorite shows. However something has apparently changed, and during the commercials there is non-stop re-buffering, freezing, which often requires the app to be closed out completely, leaving you to watch the same set of commercial blocks over and over again, with the hopes that maybe this time it won't freeze, so you can get onto the next portion of the show. If ABC wants fans to watch their shows using this app then they need to fix this!

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: Susana Martinez
comment: The audio keeps on going off...I have to rewind and fast forward to get the audio back on. 🤔🤔its annoying

author: My Trang Tran
comment: No longer able to watch shows on app anymore...not sure it was due to update... very disappointing as this used to be one of my favorite apps... :(  please fix

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: Dorianne Irons
comment: Still dislike commercials I don't like when I try to watch something , a messege error come up and I don't get to watch what I want.

author: Felipe Sanchez
comment: Before this app got updated, I did not mind the ads. Now that it got updated, the white loading wheel does not stop turning on the screen, no matter if the video is playing or not. Also, there is a long pause between each app. Please fix this. Thank you.

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content:
Hi there!

Our team would be happy to help you look into this issue! Please contact our support team either through the ABC app's feedback option under our help section or through our feedback form on our site here http://abc.go.com/feedback and select Site / Player Issues from the drop down menu.

author: Jon Culligan
comment: Doesn't work with my FireTV and you have to go through A LOT of steps in order to get to support

author: Hommy S Rivera
comment: I don't kwon why they ask for TV provider is this is a over the air chanal. Stupid uninstalling

author: Richard Podhajsky
comment: Very buggy; doesn't work properly on either my tablet or laptop; will continue playing the show in the background while commercials are playing.

author: Tekisha King
comment: Stay abreast of the latest news and local television shows with little technical issues and multi-sync capabilities for all technological devices!  #TeamABC #LotusFlower

author: David Hogan
comment: Good but no Netflix app 🙄. The app constantly loses audio during ads and then I have to restart the show and it's all messed up 😠

author: Erin OConnor
comment: Never experienced a glitch. Love being able to access live TV when away from home. Love being able to catch-up on favorite primetime shows when it is convenient for me.
Crashes waaaay too much (android tablet; just updated)

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: bitty davis
comment: Does not work unless you have major cable account...will NOT work with SlingTv!

author: Paige Wolfe
comment: I have spectrum and abc is included in my subscription yet somehow this app never works for me when i enter my cable info. Every other app does SO its pretty disappointing

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content:
Hi there!

Our team would be happy to help you look into this issue! Please contact our support team either through the ABC app's feedback option under our help section or through our feedback form on our site here http://abc.go.com/feedback and select Site / Player Issues from the drop down menu.

author: Yvette Puebla
comment: Will not let me watch new episodes even though we have this channel. I've also emailed them plenty of times and all they tell me is to delete the app and download again.

author: 412Flame
comment: This app has too many ads while watching abc shows on any devices, please reduce the commercial time to at least 1-2 minutes of commercials per break, thanks, WKBW Live stream STILL NOT AVAILABLE on ABC app, please add it now because I Can't stream the Oscars this year thanks for nothing.

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review! Please contact our customer support team through the Feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: Alivia Gaston
comment: Whenever I want to watch a show I it says there was a service error

reply.author: ABC Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Please contact our Customer Support team through the in-app feedback form under Settings so that they can further assist.

author: Grant Myers
comment: Abc promotes bigotry, don't watch their network

author: Hedy House
comment: This app is great! I didn't give 5 stars because ABC does not have live streaming in my area yet!?! I want to watch network programming when local programming has pre-empted for something else.

author: Adam DePriest
comment: Constant ads, constantly buffering then resetting the show - TERRIBLE
